question: Which of the following are true about Benu? 1. Bennu is a primitive asteroid. 2.It is also very Magnesium-rich. 3.It is a Potentially Hazardous Asteroid (PHA).
explanation: Every 6 years, Bennu’s orbit brings it within 200,000 miles of the Earth, which means it has a high probability of impacting Earth in the late 22nd Century. Bennu is a primitive asteroid, meaning it hasn’t significantly changed since the beginning of the Solar System .
